channel.title: [525]Need some help with my new server. [525]
channel.description:
[s]Need some help, I need to make myself admin, Change welcome screen, and take the server message off. Your help would be greatly appreciated![/s]
Need some more Help! How do I take the server message off, it sends "[SERVER]: Respect All admins and mods!" It shows every 30 seconds, how do I remove it?

item.title: [525]Need some help with my new server. [525]

Oh, I see. thanks.

item.title: [525]Need some help with my new server. [525]
item.dc:creator: @Fallen127 Fallen127
item.description:
@Fallen127 wrote:

[quote=“WoodcutGuy, post:10, topic:302022”]Use this download

http://uppit.com/v/BMYKWR8U

Paste it in each folder, then double click when its in the folder, and it will search all the files within that folder for you, (just type [SERVER] in the search bar)[/quote]

Thanks man.

item.title: [525]Need some help with my new server. [525]
item.dc:creator: @Fallen127 Fallen127
item.description:
@Fallen127 wrote:

[quote=“WoodcutGuy, post:4, topic:302022”]So many edits!

Lastly, if you mean when you log in the server, and it says … Example:

Welcome To RuneScape 525!
Enjoy!

Like that, in my server that is located in WorldLoader.java … What I recommend for you is Byte Searcher …[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 12, 2009, 10:00:50 pm[/size][hr][quote author=Fallen127 link=topic=398355.msg2955733#msg2955733 date=1252814318]
Thats the problem, where are the character files, this is 525, not a 317.
[/quote]

Its not a problem, and I know this isn’t a 317, don’t act dumb with me. Find your main folder, then click another till you find data, then go to characters, then click MainSave, then find your name…Jesus[/quote]

I’m not acting dumb, just explain your tip a little more next time.

Read full topic

item.title: [525]Need some help with my new server. [525]
item.dc:creator: @WoodcutGuy WoodcutGuy
item.description:
@WoodcutGuy wrote:

Make yourself admin - To do this its an easy step, once you have logged into your server, log out, go into the character files, find your name, change the prights to 2 or 3 depending on source,

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 12, 2009, 09:53:32 pm[/size][hr]And I dont know what you mean by the other 2 [br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 12, 2009, 09:55:59 pm[/size][hr]If you mean the welcome screen like where it says to click here to play, you can change what it says in the ActionSender.java Just do ctrl+f and search what is already there.

Read full topic
